song.title: Panacea
song.info:
-------------------------------------------- FOR MORE OF MY TUNES, CHECK OUT MY WEB PAGE: http://chat.carleton.ca/~sxenos --------------------------------------------
Copyright (C) 1997 Stefan Xenos
For noncommercial use only. You may distribute this tune however you like as long as you don't make a profit from it.
Written by: Stefan Xenos AKA Cyclone Song version: 1.03 Composing time: About 24 hours Completion date: November 11, 1997 Playing time: 3:40 Composed using: Impulse Tracker v2.14
This song is dedicated to the memory of Bart Dragon, a good friend who passed away recently.
If you like my music or would just like to say "hi", write me at sxenos@chat.carleton.ca or sxenos@usa.net. If you're a tracker, I'm always interested in talking tunes and exchanging techniques. I'm usually available for doing game or demo music. In other news, Hyper BBS has closed down, so you can no longer pick up my music there. I'm looking for a new way of getting my tunes distributed. If you know of any effective, free way of distributing music over the internet, I want to know about it.
Mauricio: If you're reading this, e-mail me now! I can't remember how to get ahold of you.
Sample#: Came from: _________________________________________________________
1 Necros 2,4,13,20 Pain '96 3 Dreams, by MC dreamer 6,7 The Ensoniq sample pack 8,9,16 Boost, by Shallow & Illusion / Doomsday 11,18 Purple Motion 10,19,14,15,17 Unknown _________________________________________________________
The hidden track in this song came from an unfinished IT which was sitting around on my hard drive.
